Subject: The agent issue
Description:
Hello There,

We're trialing the endpoint protector and installed the agent in a macOS client (15.3). The agent and the server both are in the latest release (I do not see the latest version here, 5.9.4.1). We can see the client status ONLINE in the dashboard but shows "Connected: NO" in the endpoint agent. 
Your colleagues suggested us to create a ticket to get technical support.

Best,
Kerem
What_We_Know__c:
The customer confirmed the Epp client is communicating with the server when they turn off the VPN.
The VPN is using TLS decription.

-------
Connectivity issues between the EPP server and EPP client on the MacOS
Next_Steps__c: The customer will try to setup an exception for the Epp client -server communication.
Solution_Comment__c: setup an TLS decription exception for the Epp client -server communication.
